```{r} 
  # FONCTION A PROPOS ---- 
draw_info_HTML <- function() {
  return(
    tags$div(
      tags$h3("À propos"),
      tags$p("Données provenant du data set",
             tags$em("Alcohol abuse (including alcoholic psychosis), number of deaths, by sex"),
             "disponible sur le European Health Information Gateway de l'OMS."))
    )
}
```
